response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. This cutting-edge solution is tailored to meet the unique needs of companies like yours, offering unparalleled features and benefits that could revolutionize your industry.

Considering its exceptional capabilities and the potential impact it can have on your organization, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product for $1,200,000. This is a limited-time opportunity, designed to ensure that you receive the best possible value for your investment while securing access to a game-changing technology.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can provide more information about how this product can specifically benefit your company. I look forward to the possibility of working together and helping your business reach new heights.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
